metadata.name: PIM Alert Setting Changes To Disabled
metadata.comment: Detects when PIM alerts are set to disabled.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('disable pim alert'))

output.summary: Detects when PIM alerts are set to disabled.

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrator disabling PIM alerts as an active choice. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-identity-management#azure-ad-roles-assignment
